DataSource.name: DsLuCustomerIsMainBillRecipient
DataSource.QueryCondition: Account__c = #pKey# AND Is_Primary_Relationship__c = '1' AND Account_Relationship__c.Relationship_Type__c = 'BillTo' AND #compareAsDate('Start_Date__c', 'Date','<=',#TodayAsDate#, 'Date')# AND #compareAsDate('End_Date__c', 'Date','>=',#TodayAsDate#, 'Date')#
